detail.description: IIFL Wealth Management Limited, founded in 2008, is one of the largest private wealth management firms in India. The company mainly acts as wealth manager and provides services relating to financial products distribution, advisory, portfolio management services by mobilizing funds and assets of various classes of investors including High Networth Individuals. [1][2]
